languages.text: "Я передам настоятелю, что потенциальному святому следует предоставить доступ к святыне и судно, на котором тот сможет нести свет Императора заблудшим мирам".

traits.locale_text: "Я передам настоятелю, что потенциальному святому следует предоставить доступ к святыне и судно, на котором тот сможет нести свет Императора заблудшим мирам".

languages.text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."
languages.original_text: "Я передам настоятелю, что потенциальному святому следует предоставить доступ к святыне и судно, на котором тот сможет нести свет Императора заблудшим мирам".

traits.locale_text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship that he could use to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."
"I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship that he could use to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."
"I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."
"I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."
"I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."
"I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."

languages.text: “我会通知教长，给这位潜在的圣人提供接触圣物的机会，并为他提供一艘船，将帝皇的光明带向变幻莫测的世界。”
languages.original_text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."

traits.locale_text: “我会通知教长，给这位潜在的圣人提供接触圣物的机会，并为他提供一艘船，将帝皇的光明带向变幻莫测的世界。”

languages.text: «Informaré al prelado de que se proporcionará al posible santo acceso a la reliquia y una nave para llevar la luz del Emperador a los mundos descarriados».
languages.original_text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."

traits.locale_text: «Informaré al prelado de que se proporcionará al posible santo acceso a la reliquia y una nave para llevar la luz del Emperador a los mundos descarriados».

languages.text: 「聖人候補が聖遺物を利用できるよう、言うこと聞かない惑星に皇帝陛下の御光を運ぶ船を提供するよう、上級聖職者に伝えるとしよう」
languages.original_text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「聖人候補が聖遺物を利用できるよう、言うこと聞かない惑星に皇帝陛下の御光を運ぶ船を提供するよう、上級聖職者に伝えるとしよう」

languages.text: « J'informerai le prélat que le saint en devenir est autorisé à disposer de la relique et se verra confier un vaisseau, afin d'apporter la lumière de l'Empereur sur les mondes égarés. »
languages.original_text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."

traits.locale_text: « J'informerai le prélat que le saint en devenir est autorisé à disposer de la relique et se verra confier un vaisseau, afin d'apporter la lumière de l'Empereur sur les mondes égarés. »

languages.text: "Ich werde den Prälat informieren, dass der potenzielle Heilige Zugang zu der Reliquie bekommen soll — und ein Schiff, um das Licht des Imperators auf verlorene Welten zu tragen."
languages.original_text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde den Prälat informieren, dass der potenzielle Heilige Zugang zu der Reliquie bekommen soll — und ein Schiff, um das Licht des Imperators auf verlorene Welten zu tragen."

languages.text: "Muhtemel azizin yadigâra erişimine izin verileceğine ve İmparator'un ışığını asi dünyalara taşıması için kendisine bir gemi sağlanacağına dair piskoposu bilgilendireceğim."
languages.original_text: "I will inform the prelate that the potential saint is to be provided with access to the relic and a ship to bring the Emperor's light to wayward worlds."
